#Cleaning Senate
I forgot to mention democrat vs republican when getting my tweets for senate. I put that information in my tidied version of All.Senate.csv. Now I am gonna open it and seperate democrats from republicans


```{r}
All.Senate.Tidied <- read_csv("All.Senate.Tidied.csv")

#Senate Dems
Senate.Democrats <- All.Senate.Tidied %>%
  filter(`R_or_D`=="D") %>%
  select(-3)
write.csv(Senate.Democrats, "Senate.Democrats.csv")

#Senate Republicans
Senate.Republicans <- All.Senate.Tidied %>%
  filter(`R_or_D`=="R")%>%
  select(-3)
write.csv(Senate.Republicans,"Senate.Republicans.csv")

```
